attributes.action: Lower the price of 0% alcohol drinks
attributes.additional_details: Pass a bill to lower the amount be able to charge by companies for 0% alcohol drinks
attributes.background: Lower the price and of 0% alcohol drinks - currently they are are the same price as alcohol abv which is no incentive for anyone to stop drinking or cut down. This does not benefit the the NHS as people will just turn back to alcohol and does not benefit the government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653581
